hexcasting.action.teawieks:label: Dymo's Gambit
teawieks.hexcasting.page.main: I've discovered that I can dye my staves and spellbooks. For spellbooks, I can also flip through pages quickly with $(k:key.teawieks.open_iota_wheel).
teawieks.hexcasting.page.labels.0: Although my current system lets me flip through my notes quickly, it would be nice to have a way to label them.$(br2)This system should let me label my pages using pattern iotas.
teawieks.hexcasting.page.labels.1: Assigns a label to the currently selected slot of a spellbook in my offhand. Null clears the label.
